overview: With a big promotion dangling overhead, Jennifer will do just about anything to get ahead. And with the help of her hilarious side kicks, they hatch a plan to take out the competition. But Veronika isn't going down without a fight. It's a dog eat dog world out there and sometimes you get bitten.
tagline: Get out of her way or she'll walk all over you...in stilettos!
title: Mean Girls
